prediction.overall_explanation: No concrete, in-scope exploit leads to fund loss or unauthorized asset movement because the contract never transfers tokens in/out and never calls Curve (no external calls). deposit/withdraw only mutate internal accounting (totalSupply, balanceOf, investedBalance) and return numbers/events. An attacker can arbitrarily change these accounting values, but this does not steal or move assets from the contract as written, so it’s not a material, exploitable vulnerability under the stated criteria.
